editorsPick.headline: Poverty, mistrust and antisemitism — Berlin Shuffle by Ulrich Alexander Boschwitz
editorsPick.teaser: This recently rediscovered, bleakly comic tale of three no-hopers in interwar Germany was written by a Jewish refugee in the 1930s. It reads like a cautionary tale for our times

society.headline: Why has the BBC ignored the Iranian uprisings?
society.teaser: The post Why has the BBC ignored the Iranian uprisings? appeared first on spiked.
